title: Ekitušgirzal
description: The temple of the goddess Bēlet-Eanna, Ekitušgirzal (“House, Abode of Joy”), was located in the New City district of Babylon, in the eastern half of the inner city. According to the Babylonian topographical text Tintir = Babylon Tablet IV, it was one of two temples in that part of Babylon.

properties.description: The proposed location of Ekitušgirzal is based on George 1992: 24 fig. 4, as well as a plan of the ruins of eastern Babylon, with 200 m UTM coordinates.
properties.title: Proposed location of Ekitušgirzal
